system.effect: Character acquires a Lesser Minion of Chaos, such as a cultist, servitor, feral xenos hound, etc. talent can be taken more than once, each time adding another Lesser Minion.

description.value: Character acquires a Lesser Minion of Chaos, such as a cultist, servitor, feral xenos hound, etc. talent can be taken more than once, each time adding another Lesser Minion.
